track.strDescriptionEN:
"Just Give Me a Reason" is a song written and recorded by American recording artist and songwriter P!nk featuring Fun.'s lead singer Nate Ruess. The song was chosen as the third single from Pink's sixth studio album The Truth About Love (2012). Prior to its release, the song charted in many regions due to strong digital sales and a music video was filmed, as confirmed by Pink herself in an interview in France.

The song became an international success, topping the Australian and New Zealand charts, as well as peaking within the Top 10 in the UK, Ireland, Canada and the United States, where it became P!nk's fourteenth Top 10 hit on the Hot 100.
